sentences.english: Some titles DO say what you do.
sentences.chinese: 一些职称的确说明你做了什么。

sentences.english: I am the medical worker of a China, deluxe title.
sentences.chinese: 我是一位中国的医务工作者，高级职称。

sentences.english: The evaluation and employment system of the college and university teachers'title is one of the most important systems in China's higher education.
sentences.chinese: 高校教师职称评聘制度，是高等教育的重要制度之一。

sentences.english: The oculists with high professional title or the PHD had high scores in the domain of environment.
sentences.chinese: 高级职称和具有博士学历者在环境领域的得分较高。

sentences.english: Great. Then what?s your technical post title now?
sentences.chinese: 太好了。那你现在的技术职称是什么？

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the advantages of septoplasty by nasal endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 探讨鼻代写职称论文内镜下鼻中隔成形术的治疗效果。

sentences.english: The company has more than 600 employees, among them, there are 88 senior engineers.
sentences.chinese: 公司现有员工600余人，其中高中级职称88人。

sentences.english: The three pediatricians in the department are all experts with secondary senior positions.
sentences.chinese: 儿科的三位医生都是有副高职称的专家。

sentences.english: More incredibly, some professors have also bought papers to fake professional titles.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些教师为了评职称竟然也买论文，真不可思议。

sentences.english: Do you think your grades accurately reflect your ability?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得你的职称就是你能力的体现吗？

sentences.english: Article 41 The State shall practice the system of professional and technical titles.
sentences.chinese: 第四十一条国家实行专业技术职称制度。

sentences.english: More than 150 engineers and technicians have the senior professional titles.
sentences.chinese: 具有高级技术职称的工程技术人员150余人。

sentences.english: Her title was business-unit general manager, even though there was no business unit.
sentences.chinese: 虽然公司里没有业务部，她的职称是业务部总经理。

sentences.english: The name tag on Dora's uniform also bears her title of night manager.
sentences.chinese: 朵拉制服上的名牌也印著她夜班经理的职称。

sentences.english: Why aren’t there more women physicists, and in senior positions?
sentences.chinese: 为何女性物理学家不多，具有高级职称的也少呢？

sentences.english: Fifthly, the NSR also pay attention to impact of the nurse professional title and nurse specialist in China.
sentences.chinese: 结合中国实际考虑护理职称和专科护士的影响。

definition: master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
